Header.title: Piyush Agarwal VoiceOvers
Header.paragraph: Energetic, Calm and blendable voice for all your needs.

About.paragraph:
Piyush Agarwal is an Indian Voice Over artist and Whiteboard Animation Professional. He'd love to help you tell your story, sell your product, or whatever else you may need a voiceover for. Take a listen to his demo. He's also very easy to work and communicate with. 
 One of the things we bring to the table is the ability to sound natural, articulate, and approachable - without sounding too announcer-y or cheeseball radio. We'll deliver a high quality WAV file, ready to go, sounding big and professional. We have a great recording rig and studio space.

Services.name: Voice Over and Dubbing
Services.text: A voice-over that sounds natural, articulate, and approachable - without sounding too announcer-y or cheeseball radio.

Services.name: Script Translation and Improvement
Services.text: Be it English or Hindi, we translate your script to an irresistible masterpiece by throwing in our magical hands and stirring it.

Services.name: Script Writing
Services.text: Our Amazing Script Writing skills take your Video / Podcast to a new high and you won't believe the magic we have on our hands.

Testimonials.text: "I got the delivery as expected. Piyush delivered it within time. Highly recommended. I am going to use this seller for all voice over needs in future."
Testimonials.name: Vichira Games

Testimonials.text: "Excellent Service By Piyush, He Delivered the Voice Over the way I required. Happy to Work with Him ."
Testimonials.name: Vagmi Services

Testimonials.text: "Quite Impressive and the Nice voice. I guess i found my permanent voiceover artist. He took very short time to deliver the order and i wasn't expecting this amazing job. In Fact his profile doesn't say much but you will love what he does to your script."
Testimonials.name: Usman Akbar

Testimonials.text: "Perfecto! Thanks so much, beautiful Hindi & translation! If you speak other dialects let me know"
Testimonials.name: Kiwi Company

Testimonials.text: "Script written was impeccable. Fast and to the 'T'. Good job!."
Testimonials.name: Inaras

Testimonials.text: "Excellent experience with this seller. Awesome delivery. I will also use him for my future projects."
Testimonials.name: Bharat Honey
